name: Topics in Improv
title: SoC RTVF 358-0-20 Topics in Improv
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Pre-req: Students must be RTVF Majors and have taken and passed RTVF 190 with a C- or better to register for this course.

descriptions.name: Learning Objectives
descriptions.value: Gain exposure to basic theatrical improv techniques. Emphasis will be placed on building ensemble and a sense of play.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Class attendance/participation, 2 short reflection papers, 1 improv show review.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
A Journal or Notebook (devoted to this class only)
Napier, Mick. "Impovise: Scene from the Inside Out," Second Edition. Meriwether Publishing ISBN-978-1566081986
Students will be required to attend one off-campus improv show of their choice (ticket prices will vary)

subject: RTVF
